select ranking,aptCode,aptName,dongCode,dongName,like_count as likeCount from houseinfo h left outer join (select rank() over(order by count(*) desc) as ranking, aptCode,count(*) like_count from houseinfolike group by aptCode having like_count > 0) hlc using (aptCode) where like_count > 0
and dongCode like concat(#{guguncode},'%')

select t1.aptCode, aptName, dongCode, dongName, buildYear, jibun, lat, lng, img, ranking, count from houseinfo join (select rank() over(order by count(*) desc) as ranking,aptCode,count(*) as count from housedeal where aptCode is not null group by aptCode) t1 on t1.aptCode = houseinfo.aptCode
where ranking <= 10;
